body:
Oh, I misread your comment, @apaszke. It seems adding an extra non-zero element is not implemented yet. We will have to take care of it when it is eventually implemented. 

```python
Dc[0,0] = 2
```


    ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

    RuntimeError                              Traceback (most recent call last)

    <ipython-input-44-6bd6cd274823> in <module>()
    ----> 1 Dc[0,0] = 2
    

    RuntimeError: fill_ is not implemented for type torch.sparse.FloatTensor
